title: 1999 Amsterdam Tournament
text: The Amsterdam Tournament is a pre-season <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament held for club teams from around the world, hosted at the <a href="Amsterdam%20ArenA">Amsterdam ArenA</a>. The 1999 tournament was contested by <a href="AFC%20Ajax">Ajax</a>, <a href="Atl%C3%A9tico%20Madrid">Atlético Madrid</a>, <a href="S.S.%20Lazio">Lazio</a> and <a href="Santos%20FC">Santos</a> on 31 July and 1 August 1999. Lazio won the tournament.
